name: UNBEATEN
description:
HOW TO PLAY

-WASD OR ARROWS FOR MOVEMENT

-LEFT CLICK FOR SHOOTING

-ONCE YOUR AMMO IS AT 0 YOU NEED TO MAKE A SACRIFICE BY DRAGGING THE ORGAN INTO THE LEFT BOX(YOU WILL LOSE THAT ORGAN THAT HAVE PLAYER STATS AND GET A NEW WEAPON)

-PRESS E TO PICK UP ORGANS
OR CHANGE ORGANS YOU DONT WANT FOR OTHERS(YOU WILL NEED TO DRAG OUT THE ORGAN TO THE LEFT BOX)

LORE

There is not much to the game other then it being a robot in a apocalypse trying to defend against a horde of other robots while taking their organs away and trading with the devil to get new weapons

THE GAME IS INFINITE

its a top down shooter inspired by hotlinemiami as you gun down enemies in a chaotic manner while trying to survive as long as possible

ORGAN STATS

-EYE'S = vision less eyes you have the more you need to think about the echo location system

-KIDNEY = shield from enemies as 1 hit will end you so make sure to have1 incase of fire

-ARM = amount of bullets shoot per bullet consumed as you can see the less arms you have the less bullets you shoot out

-LEGS = connected to your movement speed less legs less speed
